title: [Nuove skin PBE] Risen Fiddlesticks, Forsacken Jayce, Blood Moon Zilean, Master Arcanist Ziggs

embed.description: Today's patch starts off the 5.8 PBE cycle and it is MASSIVE! New stuff includes Risen Fiddlesticks, Forsaken Jayce, Blood Moon Zilean, and Master Arcanist Ziggs skins, several improvements and changes to ARAM, the previously announced Chroma packs for Lucian and Dragonfist Lee Sin, big changes for The Black Cleaver, Texture rebalances for Poppy, Shaco, Shyvana, & Teemo, and MORE!

body:
Ecco le nuove skin di questo ciclo del PBE, oltre a delle modifiche per l'ARAM, altro sui Chrome Pack, Texture Rebalance e delle golose modifiche a BC e Randuin.

http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-T9cFMPy8aOg/VSSPZ80731I/AAAAAAAAnnY/XPwnIBok7-k/s1600/fiddd.jpg
http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Uti5KeaH_ho/VSSZNp99sPI/AAAAAAAAnq0/marMUGLL-mM/s1600/jaycefronthammer.jpg
http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-n80lfrMmY58/VSSZlHICX1I/AAAAAAAAnrk/QA7752L_CPE/s1600/zileanfront.jpg
http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-VNm2L1OyLjw/VSSZr14FNLI/AAAAAAAAnr0/TR49BrNhhMI/s1600/ziggsfront.jpg

replies.body:
http://i.ytimg.com/vi/-P4BJdOMce8/maxresdefault.jpg
Mike è tornatah.
E so che si instacomprerà Zilean Luna di Swag.
Non c'è dubbioh.

Non so se comprarla o no...
Dipende se per la sua uscita avrò o no degli RP...
